patientHistory: Smoker for 20 years, diagnosed with COPD 5 years ago.
imagingReports: Chest X-ray shows hyperinflated lungs, no signs of infection.
familyHistory: No known family history of respiratory diseases.
carePlan: Encourage smoking cessation, continue bronchodilator therapy.
followUpInstructions: Schedule a follow-up in 1 month to reassess lung function.
